column4: hi folks: i'm getting this error message: "junglediskdesktop: error while loading shared libraries: libnotify.so.1: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory" when i try to run jungle disk on ubuntu 11.10 64 bit version
thats not for me is it
i'm not having a signature issue;  i'm having a run time issue
You may need to do a synlink,
If you only have libnotify.so.1.1.3   Do this:  ln -s /usr/lib/libnotify.so.1.1.3 /usr/lib/libnotify.so.1
should i ask the designer for a .svg file instead of converting it first
i htink i read that inkscape can now open .ai files directly
I don't think so... not sure tho
i see; i have gimp 2.8 i can try it
